name: CRAB IS INEVITABLE
description:
The GIANT ENEMY CRAB claims that CRAB will rule the world. Can you change this fate?

Spend your hard-earned points at the Urchin Merchant to become stronger… but at a cost! Will you become what you started out to destroy? Is there any hope?

Controls: Arrow Keys and Z/X or Mouse

This is a side-scrolling shooter made in PICO-8for Ludum Dare 50
